title: Smart Data Models - Season
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A specified time period of the year.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Season

SeasonDayTypeSchedules.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Season for the Schedule. Default: 'list'

endDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Date season ends. Default: 0.0

startDate.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Date season starts. Default: 0.0
